=====================================

### Water Survey of Canada Air Charter Requirement

**Contract Reference**: cb-737-14463842
**Amended Solicitation Number**: 5000076888

**Overview**
-----------

The Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) of Water Survey of Canada (WSC) requires a charter air service to support its water quantity data collection activities in the Northwest Territories (NT) and Nunavut (NU). The selected service provider will be responsible for safely transporting personnel and equipment to remote locations, undertaking fieldwork, and returning personnel and equipment safely.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The service provider must have access to a twin-engine, fixed-wing aircraft capable of transporting passengers and equipment to remote locations, landing on lakes and rivers. The aircraft must be equipped with:

* A copilot
* A large cargo door
* GPS
* Altimeter Radar
* Wheel skis/floats/Tundra Tires (season-dependent)
* Heated indoor washroom and staging area

The service provider must also have access to cached fuel in the general travel area, if required, and must have fueling gear with the machine.

**Period of the Contract**
-------------------------

The period of the contract is from the contract start date to December 31, 2025, inclusive. There is an option to extend the contract for up to one (1) additional year under the same conditions.

**Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs)**
--------------------------------------------

The contract is subject to the following CLCAs:

* Gwich’in Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement
* Inuvialuit Final Agreement
* Sahtu Dene and Metis Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement
* Tlicho Land Claims Agreement
* Nunavut Land Claims Agreement

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

The tender must include:

* A detailed description of the service provider's aircraft and equipment
* A comprehensive safety plan
* A detailed itinerary for all flights
* A fuel plan and information on fueling gear
* Information on the service provider's experience and qualifications
* Information on the service provider's land claims agreements

**Tender Submission**
---------------------

Tenders must be submitted electronically to [insert contact information]. The tender closing date is [insert date and time].
